summary:
yasha’s back!!!!
was she just like busy for the first eight episodes or... because honestly whenever matthew said “the six of...
body:
yasha’s back!!!!

was she just like busy for the first eight episodes or… because honestly whenever matthew said “the six of you” it always threw me for a loop. there are seven of them. there are? aren’t there?

also molly and yasha are really sweet, i love forehead kisses sm!! i die!

summary: SPOILER ALERT: NAMES MAY CONTAIN SPOILERS FOR CRITICAL ROLE CAMPAIGN 2. That's all the warning y'all are gonna get. The Mighty...
caption:
SPOILER ALERT: NAMES MAY CONTAIN SPOILERS FOR CRITICAL ROLE CAMPAIGN 2. That’s all the warning y'all are gonna get.

The Mighty Nein is one year old! To celebrate I’m releasing the swatches of my favorite project with my new business so far: Mighty Nein themed dice bags. It’s been a joy picking out fabric combos for my favorite misfits. To at least another year of these goobs!

These bags will roll out in waves, some Potential and Long May He Reign should be available by week’s end!

Head over to etsy.com/shop/legendarygeekery to check them out (be warned, I JUST opened it and only have 1 listing thus far)

blog.name: nilim
blog.title: The sky may be falling, but the stars look good on you
blog.description:
D&D, Critical Role, Discworld. 
-
I create meta, gifsets, fanart and fanfiction.

My inbox is always open for prompts, and I love getting them... but no guarantees.

summary: I don’t think she has! But I wonder whether she’d see something different or experience something
question: I don’t think she has! But I wonder whether she’d see something different or experience something
answer:
Yeah, those are my thoughts exactly. But I just can’t remember if she’s used it or not… surely she must? It feels near impossible for her not to have had a go at it yet.

But if not, and if something different does happen when she uses it… Well, I’m going to be extremely amused. 

I can’t believe they’ve been walking around with this extremely powerful artifact so closely related to Xhorhas all this time, having no idea about what it actually does except give out neat luck points, and then solution to unlocking its secrets was potentially under their noses all along.

tags: don't you dare tell me how it happens
summary: I started watching Critical Role campaign 2 just a few episodes before where they’re at currently. I went back and started from...
body:
I started watching Critical Role campaign 2 just a few episodes before where they’re at currently. I went back and started from the beginning of the campaign once I caught up with the live show and I’m just waiting for….IT…… to happen. 

Hasn’t happened yet. Will be thoroughly destroyed when it does.


(I started so far into the campaign because I didn’t really get hooked by the opening episodes of campaign 1 and wound up not watching it, so I was looking to see if I maybe would like it once I saw some combat and they had gotten their story rolling)

summary: So what happens if they follow one of the versions of themselves they see in the dodecahedron? What if they mess with one of the...
body: So what happens if they follow one of the versions of themselves they see in the dodecahedron? What if they mess with one of the strings that they see? Could they get a glimpse into their future? Could they kill someone accidentally? Could they rip the fabric of space-time? This artifact has to be able to do more than give them a bit of luck, I wish they would take some time with it to investigate.

reblog.comment: So what happens if they follow one of the versions of themselves they see in the dodecahedron? What if they mess with one of the strings that they see? This artifact has to be able to do more than give them a bit of luck, I wish they would take some time with it to investigate.

summary: if taliesin is really set on romancing liam’s character, i think i understand why he has chosen a firbolg character to do so. do...
body:
if taliesin is really set on romancing liam’s character, i think i understand why he has chosen a firbolg character to do so.

do you remember the first time they met pumat sol, back when molly was still alive? the gang went BATSHIT for matt’s voice, and marisha even said, “we’ve found our new gilmore!”

and liam said, “i’m not seducing this”.

and matt said, “you’re saying this now”.

i bet taliesin remembered it too.
